Title: Consecrated Cleanup
Description:
Our Veneration Grounds have been desecrated. Its beauty marred. 

It's going to take a bigger effort, but I would appreciate anything you can do to cleanup our grounds.
ObjectivesText: Restore the Veneration Grounds in Hallowfall.
CompletionText: I wish you could have seen this place before the Kobyss arrived.
RewardText:
Thank you, $n. It may not have seemed like much, but this is one of our most sacred places. 

We remember our dead here. We... have a lot to remember.
